body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to CarMart customer support. My name is Kyle Nelson. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Donna Peterson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Donna. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the inventory listed on your website.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm here to help clarify things for you. Can you provide your phone number and email address for verification purposes, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six six six, seven seven seven seven. And my email is donna.p@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Donna. One of our representatives will reach out to you shortly to address your concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Donna. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
